doc:
Frances Bavier https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frances_Bavier 0 Frances Elizabeth Bavier (December 14, 1902 – December 6, 1989) was an American stage and television actress. Originally from New York theatre, she worked in film and television from the 1950s until the 1970s. She is best known for her role of Aunt Bee on The Andy Griffith Show and Mayberry R.F.D. from 1960 to 1970. Aunt Bee logged more Mayberry years (ten) than any other character. She won an Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Comedy Actress for the role in 1967. Frances_Elizabeth_Bavier ( December_14_,_1902 – December_6_,_1989 ) was an_American_stage_and_television_actress . Originally from New_York_theatre , she worked in film_and_television from the_1950s until the_1970s . She is_best_known for her_role of Aunt_Bee on The_Andy_Griffith_Show and Mayberry_R.F.D. from 1960 to 1970 . Aunt_Bee logged more_Mayberry_years ( ten_) than any_other_character . She won an_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Supporting_Comedy_Actress for the_role in 1967 .
